required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mass Balance and Biotransformation Study of [14C]DBPR108 in Human
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate the Absorption, Metabolism, and Excretion of [14C]DBPR108 in Chinese Healthy Adult Male Subjects- Mass Balance and Biotransformation Study of [14C]DBPR108 in Human

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, open-label phase I clinical study to evaluate the mass balance and biotransformation pathways of [14C]DBPR108 in Chinese healthy adult male subjects, to reveal the overall pharmacokinetic characteristics of DBPR108 in human body, and to provide a reference for the rational administration.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will evaluate the mass balance and pharmacokinetics of DBPR108 in approximately 6 healthy male subjects receiving a single oral 100 mg dose of DBPR108 containing approximately 150 µCi of [14C]- DBPR108. This study consists of a screening period (Day -7 to Day -2), a baseline period (Day -1), a treatment period, and a follow-up visit period.

primary_outcome.measure: Total radioactivity in urine and feces
primary_outcome.time_frame: From time zero up to 240 hours post-dose following oral administration of [14] DBPR108
From time zero up to 96 hours post-dose following oral administration of [14] DBPR108

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time zero to the last measurable concentration (AUClast)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From time zero up to 96 hours post-dose following oral administration of [14] DBPR108

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time zero to infinity (AUCinf)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From time zero up to 96 hours post-dose following oral administration of [14] DBPR108

primary_outcome.measure: Time to achieve maximum plasma concentration (Tmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From time zero up to 96 hours post-dose following oral administration of [14] DBPR108

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From time zero up to 240 hours post-dose following oral administration of [14] DBPR108

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single oral 100 mg (radioactivity of 150 µCi) dose of [14C]DBPR108 on Day 1.

intervention.description: [14C]DBPR108, single dose of 100 mg (radioactivity of 150 µCi), oral

facility.name: First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University
